Good Comments: Amazing quality video (720p) but every once in a while poor subbing is apparent even in their v2 releases. Usually the errors are small but noticeable punctuation or capitalization errors.
Only ones doing it and they are a great fansubbing group if their first release says anything.
First to sub, but then again translation is not 100% accurate.
Loved the effects on the title screen and the subbing was amazing, also they were the first ones to the scene and still the only ones as of now.
Bad Comments: Excellent typesetting, styled subs, accurate translations.
